## ChangeReason enum

The potential reason for changes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ChangeReason 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  JumpBackward | <code>&quot;jump-backward-change&quot;</code> | The user has moved from one suggestion to another suggestion earlier in the document. |
|  JumpForward | <code>&quot;jump-forward-change&quot;</code> | The user has moved from one suggestion to another suggestion further along in the document. |
|  Move | <code>&quot;move&quot;</code> | The cursor was moved. |
|  SelectionInside | <code>&quot;selection-inside&quot;</code> | A change happened to the selection status. |
|  Start | <code>&quot;start&quot;</code> | The user has entered or started a new suggestion. |
|  Text | <code>&quot;change-character&quot;</code> | A changed happened to the character. This can be addition, deletion or replacement. |
